Three Hawke’s Bay brothers behind Tumu Group win Family Business Award at EY Entrepreneur of the Year https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/ Three-hawkes-bay-brothers-behind-tumu-group-win-family-business-award-at-ey-entrepreneur-of-年/PICSFT2LPFG4JNNC5N2P6LU6OQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/ Three-hawkes-bay-brothers-behind-tumu-group-win-family-business-award-at-ey-entrepreneur-of-年/PICSFT2LPFG4JNNC5N2P6LU6OQ/ Gary Hamilton-IrvineThey say it’s unwise to mix work with family. There are exceptions, of course. Fri, 08 Dec 2023 17:00:00 +0000 The O'Sullivan family behind Tumu Group, which has been recognised with a top award. Pictured are brothers John, Brendan and Barry O'Sullivan (centre) as well as John's wife Michelle and son Daniel. Photo / Paul Taylor
